body_html: I have tried to compile on the machine with lower GLIBC version. Unfortunately, The compile tool (Bazel) need one higher GLIBC[bazel: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.14' not found (required by bazel)]. Consequently, there is no way to run the native tensorflow program on machine with lower GLIBC version（<2.14）...

body: I have tried to compile on the machine with lower GLIBC version. Unfortunately, The compile tool (Bazel) need one higher GLIBC[bazel: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.14' not found (required by bazel)]. Consequently, there is no way to run the native tensorflow program on machine with lower GLIBC version（<2.14）...
